front.title: Eriadu Operative
front.gametext: While at a Eriadu site: adds 1 to your Force drains there, is power +1 (or +2 if your commander, general or moff is on Eriadu) and, once during each of your deploy phases, may deploy one site to Eriadu from Reserve Deck- reshuffle.
front.lore: Used by Imperial officers as a contact between the Empire and local citizenry. Keep the Imperial bureaucracy informed on planetary issues.
